    <element name="X509Data" type="ds:X509DataType"/>
    <complexType name="X509DataType"> 
        <sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> 
          <choice> 
            <element name="X509IssuerSerial" type="ds:X509IssuerSerialType"/>

    </complexType>
